author: jefft
msg: Roll back.. can't make this change incrementally

author: jefft
msg: Pass the full path to the menu (book) generator, instead of just the current
directory.  Used by the algorithm that chooses a subset of site.xml to render
as the menu.  The current algorithm only needs to know the current directory,
but a @tab-selection algorithm needs the full @href.

author: jefft
msg: Move id-generation-from-titles out of the source generation pipeline.
Specifically, this lets one first aggregate multiple sources and then run idgen

author: jefft
msg: Leave out the PDF outline's root link, as it is useless.
